notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: S. Monsen, two-story brick building, 3407 Le Moyne Street. Cost, $7,000.
C. S. Johnson, three-story brick building, 1427-23 Rosemont Avenue. Cost, $64,000.
J. P. Esholm, two-story brick building, 1809-11 Garfield Boulevard. Cost, $12,000.
C. Jacobsen, two-story brick building, 3323 Cortez Street. Cost, $10,000.
J. O. Svensen, four 1-story frame dwellings, 4836-46 Bernice Avenue. Cost, $10,000.
M. Berget, two-story frame dwelling, 4239 Henderson Avenue. Cost, $4,000.
C. Dahlberg, one-story brick building, 7833 Bishop Street. Cost, $3,000.
G. Gustafson, three 2-story brick buildings, 4206-12 Sawyer Avenue. Cost, $16,500.
G. K. Ericsen, one-story frame dwelling, 1440 Morgan Street. Cost, $1,000.
Carl J. Nelson, three-story brick building, 2644-46 Garrison Avenue. Cost, $35,000.
Frank Banson, two-story brick building, 1815 South Peoria Street. Cost, $5,000.
